text: Gounderpalayam (), is a suburb located North of Chennai, a metropolitan city in Tamil Nadu, India. ==Location== Gounderpalayam is located in between Manali New Town and Minjur in North of Chennai. The arterial road in Gounderpalayam is Tiruvottiyur Ponneri Panchetty High Road. ==References== ==External links== *CMDA Official Webpage Category:Neighbourhoods in Chennai
title: Gounderpalayam
